cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each schema-registry instance.

heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be no greater than ~64MB less than total memory for the instance.

instances.description: Number of instances to run (currently limited to 1).

kafkastore-connection-url.description: Zookeeper Connect string for service cluster. Format is comma-separated list of <zk-host>:<zkport>/<kservice>

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each schema-registry instance.

role.description: Deploy schema-registry only on nodes with this role.

vip-label.description: Label for external access to schema-registry service. Format is <IP>:<port>

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on minimum keyword or maximum keyword
